Posts.Content: Ok so I am 5mths post Devinci surgery. I am at 4-5 pads a day, non strict keagels, hip abduction exercises in the gym. Went for bladder test yesterday, they say that I need an artificial sphincter. I awaiting radiation, my doctor is concerned about me being to wet. I was wondering you all take on waiting out till after radiation before exploring AUS. Thanks Bear
Posts.Title: Hello everyone!! Incontinence question
